ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
Owen Seasons has been found, but the mystery around his death continues to haunt Sam Dante. As darker forces emerge in Devil Land, can Sam really control his family’s terrifying legacy?
“Horror fans and theme park fans absolutely owe it to themselves to check out DARK RIDE.” —ComicBook.com
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adriano Lucas,Allen Passalaqua,Andrei Bressan,Dennis Culver,Paulina Ganucheau,Reiko Murakami,Tony Fleecs,Trish Forstner
